subject: Technology
title: Six Degrees: The First Social Network
description: Learn Six Degrees: The First Social Network in one minute.

hook.text: In 1997, SixDegrees.com let you create a profile and list your friends. Sound familiar?

buildup.text: It was based on the idea that everyone on Earth is connected by six relationships or fewer.

discovery.text: SixDegrees reached 3.5 million users. People could see their social connections mapped online.

twist.text: The site shut down in 2001. People had profiles but nothing to actually do on them.

climax.text: SixDegrees proved people wanted social connections online. It just arrived before broadband.

punchline.text: The first social network had the right idea at the wrong time.

quiz.question: Why did SixDegrees.com fail?
options: Users had profiles but nothing to do
